author: jfarcand
msg: Securize the package so it can work under the SecurityManager when the org.apache.jasper is protected. Fix bugs when the JSP 2.0 examples were executed under the SecurityManager.

author: luehe
msg: Use 'this' qualifier to disambiguate jspContext instance
(e.g., required when invoking fragment from within simple tag).

author: luehe
msg: Append tag directive (containing single 'pageEncoding' attribute whose
value is hard-coded to UTF-8) to XML view of tag files, and suppress
'pageEncoding' attribute in any existing tag directives.

author: remm
msg: - This appreas to fix the stack overflow.
